title: Club still Disappeared

embed.description: So I just recently saw that Clubs were brought back online, only to find that the club(that I own) is now gone. I know for certain that I did not leave or disband my Club. Naturally, I go to create another one only to see that the name of it was taken, so it must still exist.

body:
i own the club but i can't see it meanwhile my friends who's in the club can see it and can see me there 
i can't even see the chat or anything .
i wrote my data on the previous discussion but it seems you checking it so i created a new one 
it looks like this bug only happen to the club owners
and i know you can do something about it 
so here's my data 
Hopefully you can help me.

Club Name : The A Team 
Club Tag : TEAMÂ©
Owner : 2dartist

thanks in advance

replies.body: This should have been resolved, so we'd like to look at your specific case individually to see what's going on.  Reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can see.  We'll reply back asap!
